title: Changing my email when i cant access my old one.
body:
Hello! to TLDR this I made this account quite a bit ago and well i sorta....fell out of playing. I wont bore you with my life story but basically i had no consistent way to play for a couple years.

Bu now I have a new place, job, and all that. Trouble is I kinda also have a new email and dont have access to the one I used. In fact if im not mistaken i deleted it as Yahoo wont even recognize my username on it (its my same SN here)
this is troubling as when i went to change my email, i was sent an email confirmation. The problem of course being I cant access that email. I was going to make a support ticket but again, guess where that would go. Is there a way to get a code sent to my new email?

Also I think this is a silly Q but I can change my account name too right? Like what I use to login, not the SN in game? I've gotten more creative than this in the years I been gone lol.

replies.body:
No worries, we can help with this!  Just fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team will take a look, and update your account info after verifying ownership.  Usernames can't be changed, though, it is private so nobody will see it! 
 See you there!

Alright thank you I have filled out the thing. I'm not sure how I could prove it other than asking the friend I had recommend post here vouch for me as again it's been quite a bit since i been around.

Ah darn, well i guess i'll just have to accept logging in this way. Thanks for the reply.
